remarks: The group inverse in the symmetric group corresponds to the functional inverse.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Aug-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)
statement:
symggrp.1 $e |- G = ( SymGrp ` A ) $.
symginv.2 $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
symginv.3 $e |- N = ( invg ` G ) $.
symginv $p |- ( F e. B -> ( N ` F ) = `' F ) $.
